scenes.action_text: THE CINCINNATI KID Written by Ring Lardner Jr. and Terry Southern Based on a novel by Richard Jessup SHOOTING DRAFT - 1965 FADE IN: SERIES OF ESTABLISHING SHOTS - DAY Exterior scenes of St. Louis, particularly the riverside industrial district.
